titleStmt.title: Description of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 467: Lists of prospective contributors

publicationStmt.publisher: Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library

availability.licence: These images and the content of Center for Advanced Judaic Studies Library, Halper 467: Lists of prospective contributors are free of known copyright restrictions and in the public domain. notesStmt.note: A list of about 95 names, divided into classified columns, including residents of the Maṣṣasa quarter, residents of the 'Atarin (perfumers) quarter, and physicians. Some of the names are recognized from other 13th century documents; Much of the contents of the list were described by Goitein, Mediterranean Society, vol. II Appendix C no. 136 (p. 508).
